titleStmt.title: A way of reconciliation of a good and learned man touching the trueth, nature, and substance of the body and blood of Christ in the sacrament. Translated out of Latin by the right honorable Lady Elizabeth Russell, dowager to the right honourable the Lord Iohn Russell, Baron, and sonne and heire to Francis Earle of Bedford.

A way of reconciliation of a good and learned man touching the trueth, nature, and substance of the body and blood of Christ in the sacrament. Translated out of Latin by the right honorable Lady Elizabeth Russell, dowager to the right honourable the Lord Iohn Russell, Baron, and sonne and heire to Francis Earle of Bedford.
titleStmt.author: Russell, Elizabeth Cooke Hoby, Lady, ca. 1540-1609.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A way of reconciliation touching the Lords Supper.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
